Summary: i see them every day & night - there are 2-3 different types & where i go they go. i sound like such a nut case but it's true.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Glidden
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi now know it started before but mainly after i moved to the country. just a day or two after i bought the place & started working out there i noticed lights in the night sky that seemed to be moving. a couple nights later i noticed they looked like they were following my truck. now that i know what to look for there are a lot of them. about the time i try to talk myself in to thinking it's a opiticial illusion something happens to make me know it is happening. they look like brinking stars -- they ones that look most like stars are the closest that seem to follow me the most. they have streaked across the night sky & stopped right in front of the pickup & turn with my every turn. there are also star like ones that you can see are turning different colors. they seem to be farther away but when you look at them with binoculars they are rarely clear \ almost blurry but then one night i seen two much closer than normally & the reason they where never clear to see was they are moving & bouncing around so fast \ whipping up & down they apear blurry. i noticed the clear star looking ones first because they would be low in the sky & very bright. i thought if it was'nt a star it was a satilight. my first reactions were i can't be seeing these things & it scared the hell out of me. i have been 100 miles away & as soon as the sun goes down the first thing i notice are these lights. there will almost always be 2 of them to begin with & in a short time you will see a few dozon more. i need someone to tell me what type & kind of camera to buy because most places i have checked the sales people don't know one from another. i have seen these lights for over 2 years now & never said anything to anyone for over a year but now i need to know what this is all about. i feel like i need to distance myself from these things but i don't realy think you can hide. but i need some proff -- a photo or film but i don't care to play trial & errear game finding a camera that takes night photos. i have a good bussiness & don't want to be thought of as some crack pot but this is something hard to see and not share with someone.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
